page.title: 17WAKERINGS LOCAL GOVERNMENT
page.content: THERE ARE 3 PARISH COUNCILS, 1 BOROUGH COUNCIL AND 1 DISTRICT COUNCIL IN OUR AREA. OUR COUNTY COUNCIL IS ESSEX. THESE DIFFERENT COUNCILS CONTROL DIFFERENT AREAS AND SERVICES. HOUSING, EDUCATION, ROADS, PUBLIC TRANSPORT, RECREATIONAL FACILITIES, HOMES FOR THE ELDERLY AND STREET CLEANING ARE AMONG THE SERVICES PROVIDED BY THE COUNTY COUNCIL. THE PARISH COUNCIL DEALS WITH ALLOTMENTS, CEMETRIES, ENTERTAINMENT, STREET LIGHTS, RUBBISH DISPOSAL, PARKS, PARKING AND OTHER OTHER MATTERS WHICH ARE RELEVANT TO ITS PARTICULAR AREA. THE PEOPLE RUNNING A COUNCIL ARE ELECTED BY PEOPLE LIVING IN THE AREA AND THEREFORE REPRESENT THE INTERESTS OF LOCAL RESIDENTS. THE RATES THAT ARE PAID BY OUR MUMS AND DADS PAY FOR THE FACILITIES PROVIDED BY COUNCILS.
